content: रोचक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [रुच्-ण्वुल्] {@--1@} Brightening, enlightening. {@--2@} Pleasant, agreeable. {@--3@} Exciting appetite. --कं {@--1@} Hunger. {@--2@} Any medicine serving as a tonic or restoring lost appetite, a stimulant, tonic. {@--3@} A worker in glass or artificial ornament. {@--4@} The plantain.
